data.title: Zookeeper 2
data.meta_description: The Nephew of the Zookeeper (also known as Zookeeper 2 on DVD) is a American animated family television film, starring the voices of Grant Palmer, Kevin James, Rosario Dawson & Ryan Stiles. data.text:
The Nephew of the Zookeeper (also known as Zookeeper 2 on DVD) is a American animated family television film, starring the voices of Grant Palmer, Kevin James, Rosario Dawson & Ryan Stiles. It is the sequel to 2011 film Zookeeper (2011). A year after Griffin and Kate got married, Griffin's 14 year old nephew Mason comes to visit him for the whole Summer, and Griffin has just ordered a new animal to the zoo. Meanwhile, however, a business man wants to destroy Franklin Park Zoo to make room for a factory to serve meat from animals. Unlike its predecessor, it received some mixed reviews, about 146 (96 positives & 50 negatives).

Kevin James, Adam Sandler & Rosario Dawson are the only actors to reprise their roles, as the rest of the cast didn't participated.

Plot[]

TBA

Cast[]

Humans[]

Mason Keyes (voiced by Grant Palmer) The 14 year old teenager, and the nephew of Griffin. According to him, he likes zoology since elementary school. The first animal that Mason met (and talked to) was Janet, Joe's mate.

Hendrik K. Martins (voiced by Ryan Stiles) A business man who wants to get rid of the zoo to make a meat factory.

Griffin Reyes (voiced by Kevin James) The lead zookeeper.

Kate (voiced by Rosario Dawson) The zoo veterinarian and Griffin's current wife.

Mick & Rick (both voiced by Rob Paulson with different voices) Hendrik's two henchmen, and they both work for him. Most of the time, whenever they tried to do something right, it goes wrong.

Animals[]

Bernie (voiced by Mark Hamill) A Western lowland gorilla.

Joe (voiced by Colin Murdock) An African lion.

Janet (voiced by Kathleen Barr) a lioness and Joe's mate.

Donald (voiced by Adam Sandler) A tufted capuchin.

Barry (voiced by Brian Drummond) An Indian elephant.

Jerome & Bruce (voiced by Trevor Devall & Mark Acheson separately) a brown bear and a Kodiak bear.

Mollie (voiced by Cree Summer) a reticulated giraffe.

Sebastian (voiced by Maurice LaMarche) a wolf.

Sissy (voiced by Kate Higgins) is a rattlesnake. Despite being one, she's quite friendly like the other animals, even though they stayed away from her at first.

Trivia[]

This film marks several things:

The first movie from the previous to be tradtionally-animated.

The only film to have the animals being voiced by voice actors (with the exception of Adam Sandler)

In most international dubs, Mason was voiced by a woman. That was involved in Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, French (France), Italian, Korean, & Spanish (Venezuela/Miami/Spain).

In both Dutch dubs, Bas Rutten, who originally voices Sebastian the wolf in the original movie, provided Sebastian's voice in this dub.
